sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_157f5d1f1b1333003dedda49cc4bcbe1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Import Historic NeedIt Data">da3459531b1333003dedda49cc4bcb63</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[// If the source data does not have a u_requested_for_email field, 
  // create the target email address from the Requested for value.  Email addresses 
  // have the format firstname.lastname@example.com.  Convert the u_requested_for 
  // value to lowercase.  Replace the space with a . and concatenate with 
  // @example.com
  if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)){
  	var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
  	target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
  }]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-21 13:28:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>157f5d1f1b1333003dedda49cc4bcbe1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onStart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_157f5d1f1b1333003dedda49cc4bcbe1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-08-21 13:28:47</sys_updated_on><when>onStart</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
